name: Critical Mass (itch) (PotatoFaceJames, SparkyMcSparks)
description:
Roll over objects smaller than you to get bigger, then once you reach critical mass you'll start consuming everything!

Made during the VR Austin Game Jam 2019 by Alex Romo, James Nye.

Special thanks to JJ and Levon for sounds!

(ALL HMD types should be supported, Oculus, Vive, and Index)
